item.title: Spring整合Elasticsearch
item.author: dev.HalKlein@gmail.com (HalKlein)
item.description: 引入依赖 spring-boot-starter-data-elasticsearch https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework.boot/spring-boot-starter-data-elasticsearch <!-- Spring整合Elasticsearch --> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-elasticsearch</artifactId> </dependency> 配置Elasticsearch cluster-name、cluster-n

item.title: Elasticsearch 入门
item.author: dev.HalKlein@gmail.com (HalKlein)
item.description: Elasticsearch简介 Elasticsearch，分布式搜索引擎，简称ES，是目前最流行性能最好的搜索引擎之一，像Facebook、
